title: Three power pilferers held
content:
BUREWALA, Oct 22 (APP):The Multan Electric Power Company (MEPCO) team arrested three individuals and registered cases against five others for electricity theft.

According to MEPCO spokesperson XEN Fiaz Hussain Khokhar, the arrests were made during a major operation against power pilferage within the company’s jurisdiction.

Khokhar reaffirmed MEPCO’s commitment to continuing the campaign against electricity theft and warned that no culprit would escape legal action.
